definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: It enables exact calculation of distance and can perceive ultra-violet and polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 它能够精确计算距离并且能够感受紫外线和偏振光。

sentences.english: Recent research shows that many fish sense polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 最近的研究显示，许多鱼类能感应到偏振光。

sentences.english: A new structure of polarized light interference interleaver is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种偏振光干涉型光交错复用器的新结构。

sentences.english: Rotation spectrum of quartz in the orthogonal polarization road is experimentally studied.
sentences.chinese: 对正交偏振光路中石英旋光光谱现象进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: Linearly polarized light will in consequence become elliptically polarized on total reflection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，线偏振光径全反射后将变成椭圆偏振光。

sentences.english: The appearance of strong reflection bands in the polarized spectra was explained by the aid of crystal structure.
sentences.chinese: 解释出现在偏振光谱的强反射带的援助的晶体结构。

sentences.english: The circularly polarized light is then focused down onto the disk.
sentences.chinese: 圆偏振光经物镜聚焦后射到光盘上。

sentences.english: Polarized light's electrical properties can reveal the presence and alignment of magnetic fields.
sentences.chinese: 偏振光的电学性能可以揭示磁场的存在及排列情况。

sentences.english: The above image was taken in mid January in infrared and polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 上图是以红外偏振光拍摄于一月中旬。
